Back to Johann Sebastian Bach

Johann Sebastian Bach

Fifteen Inventions, BWV 772–786

1722–1723

[Wikipedia] · [IMSLP]

Total duration: 20'

  • 1. C major, BWV 772
  • 1. C major, BWV 772 (alternative version)
  • 2. C minor, BWV 773
  • 3. D major, BWV 774
  • 4. D minor, BWV 775
  • 5. E-flat major, BWV 776
  • 6. E major, BWV 777
  • 7. E minor, BWV 778
  • 8. F major, BWV 779
  • 9. F minor, BWV 780
  • 10. G major, BWV 781
  • 11. G minor, BWV 782
  • 12. A major, BWV 783
  • 13. A minor, BWV 784
  • 14. B-flat major, BWV 785
  • 15. B minor, BWV 786

Earlier versions of the inventions (BWV3 772.1–786.1) exist in the Notebook for Wilhelm Friedemann Bach; the differences compared to the later versions (BWV3 772.2–786.2) are generally minor.

Recommended editions

  • Neue Bach-Ausgabe (Bärenreiter) · V, 3 · BA 5035-01 · Inventionen und Sinfonien · ed. Georg van Dadelsen [including alternative version of BWV 772]
  • Neue Bach-Ausgabe (Bärenreiter) · V, 5 · BA 5021-01 · Klavierbüchlein für Wilhelm Friedemann · ed. Wolfgang Plath [version from the Notebook for Wilhelm Friedemann Bach]
  • Associated Board · Inventions & Sinfonias · ed. Richard Jones [including alternative version of BWV 772]
  • Bärenreiter · BA 5150 · Inventionen und Sinfonien · ed. Georg van Dadelsen [including alternative version of BWV 772]
  • Bärenreiter · BA 5241 · Inventionen und Sinfonien · ed. Georg van Dadelsen [including alternative version of BWV 772]
  • Bärenreiter · BA 5163 · Klavierbüchlein für Wilhelm Friedemann Bach · ed. Wolfgang Plath [version from the Notebook for Wilhelm Friedemann Bach]
  • Henle · HN 589 · Inventionen und Sinfonien · ed. Ullrich Scheideler [including alternative version of BWV 772]
  • Henle · HN 590 · Inventionen und Sinfonien · ed. Ullrich Scheideler [including alternative version of BWV 772]
  • Henle · HN 1589 · Inventionen und Sinfonien · ed. Ullrich Scheideler [including alternative version of BWV 772]
  • Peters · EP 11422 · 15 zweistimmige Inventionen / 15 dreistimmige Sinfonien · ed. Ulrich Bartels [including alternative version of BWV 772]
  • Peters · EP 11242 · ed. Ulrich Bartels [including alternative version of BWV 772]
  • Peters · EP 11502 · Clavier-Büchlein für Wilhelm Friedemann Bach · ed. Christoph Wolff [version from the Notebook for Wilhelm Friedemann Bach]
  • Wiener Urtext · UT 50253 · Inventionen und Sinfonien · ed. Ulrich Leisinger [including BWV 772a and a further version of BWV 778]

1. C major, BWV 772

The Neue Bach-Ausgabe gives this invention in versions with and without Bach’s later triplet additions.

Duration: 1'

Difficulty: 1.5

1. C major, BWV 772 (alternative version)

In BWV1,2,2a, this version is identified as BWV 772a.

Duration: 1'

Difficulty: 2

2. C minor, BWV 773

Duration: 1' 30"

Difficulty: 2

Difficulty: 2
